casebody.data:
Friday, March 3, 1995

MOTION DOCKET

95-417. No. 94OT026. State v. Bacon. Ottawa County,

This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution of sentence pending appeal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and the same hereby is, denied, effective February 28, 1995.

Resnick, J., not participating.
